item.title: Close contact and Outbreak associated is main cause for Toronto COVID-19 spreat
item.description: Abstruct This analysis is about Toronto COVID-19 infection condition. We can conclude that traveling is the cause of COVID-19 entering Toronto, but outbreaksand close contact is the main cause of the continued spread of COVID-19. Also, young people are more likely to get COVID-19 from close contact, while older people are more likely to be affected by outbreaks. # Discribe Data This data set contains demographic, geographic, and severity information for all confirmed and probable cases reported to and managed by Toronto Public Health since the first case was reported in January 2020.
